'''Amon Obel''' was a hill in the midst of the [[Brethil|Forest of Brethil]]<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref> on which was built the settlement of [[Ephel Brandir]], which became the main settlement of the [[Haladin]].<ref>{{CH|13}}, p. 193</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Amon Obel'' is a [[Sindarin]] name for "Fortified Hill", composed of the words ''[[amon]]'' ("hill") and ''[[gobel]]'' ("walled settlement").
